title: Bloomberg Markets: Polovets on How a VC Spends Time
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Polovets on How a VC Spends Time
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Leo Polovets\u0010Partner\u0010Susa Ventures\u0010Discussing the behind scenes at a venture capital fund, including how time is spent and what to look for.
